characters.name: Joo-Heon Seo
characters.description: After getting betrayed by his own boss who feared his rising power and sent to a death mission, he gets help from a strange relic which sends him 15 years back in time, when tombs just started appearing.

characters.name: Irene  Holton
characters.description: Irene Holton is the only daughter of the Holton Family. She was known as the Monarch of Destitution.Irene is an innocent girl that is at first reluctant to do anything.But during the fight against the relic Hand of Midas, with the help of Seo Joo-Heon, she gained confidence and dominate the relic and now have complete control over it. After the event, she gained more confidence and will help Seo Joo-Heon do every tasks.

characters.name: Seol-Ah Lee
characters.description:
Lee Seol-Ah was a member of the TKBM Tomb raiding team under the command of Seo Ju-Heon.She was a scout skilled at finding people and relics. She is currently working for the Chinese raiding group of Red Flowers. She attempted to thwart Seo Joo-Heon plan of selling the fake Nero's Relic which was presumed to be the relic of Julius Ceaser by destroying it with a B ranked dagger.

(Source: Tomb Raider King Wiki)

characters.name: Jae-Ha Yoo
characters.description:
Before the time rewind, he was (and still is) a specialist in relic restoration. He became known as the Fraud King, something which Chairman Kwon eventually became aware of. Jae-Ha met Joo-Heon through being on the same raiding team.

~!When Joo-Heon tries to seek him out in order to repair his relics, Irene informs him that he is 'dead'. She then recounts that he had sold her brother, George Hilton, a false painting. He was caught for the fraud and was presumed dead after his car fell down a cliff.He's later discovered to be alive when Edward called him on behalf of Chairman Kwon. Since he'd damaged his relic and needed it to be repaired. Something he agrees to.

Joo-Heon lures him out by requesting a relic restoration. His high-ranking relics making Jae-Ha try to scam him with false ones, running away with the real ones. He fails to do so, being caught by Joo-Heon's rope relic.

He is then approached to sign a 'slave contract' which is then reformed to an 'exclusive contract'. In order to rope him in, Joo-Heon offers an explanation for how Richard Chang (his tutor) stole Jae-Ha's art style. In addition to giving him back the elements of art and reputation that Richard had stolen from him.!~

characters.name: Julian Miller
characters.description: Jullian Miller was framed by Seo Joo-Heon as the culprit and blackmailer attempting to steal the Julius Caesar relic.

characters.name: Chloe Laurent
characters.description: Chloe is a medic skilled at healing the injured and suppressing risks caused by relics. She can store relic risks inside bottles and use them.

characters.name: Ilya Volgof
characters.description:
Ilya Volgof was a member of TKBM's Team 13 under the command of Seo Joo-Heon.

He is the most skilled of the Aftermath Clean-up Crew which specializes in modifying memories and disbanding tomb raiding teams.

He is currently working for Kwon Hyuk Soo after quitting his job as a talented Russian exorcism priest at the Vatican in Italy and losing his girlfriend Galina to find a way to revive her without realizing that the Vatican executed her and used her as a sacrifice for Un-Known.

After he regained his memories, he betrayed Kwon Hyuk Soo but refused to rejoin the team which resulted in him being beaten up and forced to sign Seo Joo-Heon's contract.

characters.name: Edward
characters.description: Edward is a world renowned weapons and information merchant and illegal arms dealer.

characters.name: Tae-Joon Kwon
characters.description:
Kwon Tae-Joon is the main villain of Tomb Raider King.

Kwon Tae-Joon is CEO of TKBM Company and TKBM Excavation Team. In previous life, he became the strongest relic user with the help of Seo Joo-heon and his team.

characters.name: Hae-Jin Im
characters.description: Im Hae-Jin is a legendary Hunter and tanker whose immense strength and tough skin earned him the titles of Asura and the Ghost of Death. He is like a human weapon that allowed Seo Joo-Heon to only focus on tomb evacuation.
